content.slidertext1: 24 Aerial neighborhood videos and growing for

about.abouttext2: We are a subscription service giving you access to a database of aerial drone videos of communities in your area! Right now we have 24 aerial neighborhood videos uploaded. We plan on growing that number to 40+ in the next few weeks. If you were to pay for these videos individually, you would need to come up with 24 * $300 = $7200, or when its 40 * $300 = $12,000. We are going to give you all that for $50 a month or $300 for a year. You get all those videos for the price of one, on itâ€™s very own customized landing page. You can create as many landing pages as you like, allowing you to customize them to each and every client. Leaving a very personal touch! Visit FlyMyCommunity.com today to sign up!
